abstract: Comcast’s second-quarter earnings rose to $1.7 billion, exceeding analysts’ estimates, helped by the continued growth of the company’s broadband Internet and business products.
snippet: Comcast’s second-quarter earnings rose to $1.7 billion, exceeding analysts’ estimates, helped by the continued growth of the company’s broadband Internet and business products.
lead_paragraph: The broadband Internet business continues to look bright for Comcast, which reported profit and revenue increases on Wednesday that surpassed analysts’ already sunny projections.

headline.main: Comcast Profit Jumps 28.6% on Growth of Broadband
headline.print_headline: Comcast Profit Jumps 28.6% on Growth of Broadband
